text.language: Agioc o~ Yeoc: a~gioc ic,uroc: a~gioc a~yanatoc: o~ Iordanou baptict/c: e~le/~con /~mac.
Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who was baptized in the Jordan, have mercy upon us.
Allah Kudus, Mahakuasa Kudus, Kekal Kudus, yang dibaptis di Yordan, kasihanilah kami
قدوس الله قدوس القوى قدوس الحي الذي لا يموت، يا من اعتمد فى الأردن إرحمنا.
